dm:bugtracker.dm:product: Using SUSE Automation to Deploy an SAP HANA Cluster on {cloud} Cloud Platform

meta: SAP HANA Cluster on {cloud} with SUSE Automation
Deployment of a two-node SAP HANA High Availability Cluster using the SUSE Automation Project into a sandbox environment, operated on a public cloud

abstract.para: The document at hand walks you through the deployment of a two-node SAP HANA High Availability Cluster using the SUSE Automation Project into a sandbox environment, operated on {cloud}.
